Third Act [i](If your life total is less than half of your starting life total or if you have one or fewer cards in hand, you enter the Third Act for the rest of the game.)[/i]
When this creature enters, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
{T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you're in your third act, that creature gets +3/+3 instead. Activate only as a sorcery.
